Token.Abstract:
The name of the federated user associated with the credentials. For information about limitations on user names, go to Limitations on IAM Entities in Using AWS Identity and Access Management.

Constraints:
Length: 2 - 32
Pattern: [\w+=,.@-]*

The name of the federated user associated with the credentials. For information about limitations on user names, go to Limitations on IAM Entities in Using AWS Identity and Access Management.

Constraints:
Length: 2 - 32
Pattern: [\w+=,.@-]*

A policy specifying the permissions to associate with the credentials. The caller can delegate their own permissions by specifying a policy, and both policies will be checked when a service call is made. For more information about how permissions work in the context of temporary credentials, see Controlling Permissions in Temporary Credentials in Using AWS Identity and Access Management.

Constraints:
Length: 1 - 2048
Pattern: [\u0009\u000A\u000D\u0020-\u00FF]+

A policy specifying the permissions to associate with the credentials. The caller can delegate their own permissions by specifying a policy, and both policies will be checked when a service call is made. For more information about how permissions work in the context of temporary credentials, see Controlling Permissions in Temporary Credentials in Using AWS Identity and Access Management.

Constraints:
Length: 1 - 2048
Pattern: [\u0009\u000A\u000D\u0020-\u00FF]+

The duration, in seconds, that the session should last. Acceptable durations for federation sessions range from 3600s (one hour) to 129600s (36 hours), with 43200s (12 hours) as the default.

Constraints:
Range: 3600 - 129600

The duration, in seconds, that the session should last. Acceptable durations for federation sessions range from 3600s (one hour) to 129600s (36 hours), with 43200s (12 hours) as the default.

Constraints:
Range: 3600 - 129600
Default constructor for a new GetFederationTokenRequest object. Callers should use the property methods to initialize this object after creating it.
Constructs a new GetFederationTokenRequest object. Callers should use properties to initialize any additional object members.

Parameter.Name: theName
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the federated user associated with the credentials. For information about limitations on user names, go to Limitations on IAM Entities in Using AWS Identity and Access Management.

Token.Abstract: Returns a string representation of this object; useful for testing and debugging.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A string representation of this object.
